H0.text: Which playwright wrote Murder in the Cathedral. Oscar Wilde

H1.text: Which playwright wrote Murder in the Cathedral. George Bernard Shaw

H2.text: Which playwright wrote Murder in the Cathedral. Eugene O'Neill

H3.text: Which playwright wrote Murder in the Cathedral. T.S.E.

A4.text: Murder in the Cathedral is a verse drama by T. S. Eliot, first performed in 1935 (published the same year).
